description: The funding toolkit identifies funding sources for three broad categories of livability elements: infrastructure investments, which may include right-of-way improvements, sidewalks, Green Streets, or bike lanes/facilities; community development, such as affordable housing, public services, schools, historic preservation; and parks and open space, which includes parks, playfields, plazas, and p-patches.

metadata.attribution: City of Seattle, Seattle Planning Commission

name: Transit Communities Funding Toolkit
